unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Making Waves!**
normalised: energy and utilities: solar rooftop subsidies making waves!

unnormalised: Guess what, Chennai folks? Going solar is now even easier (and cheaper!) thanks to the updated rooftop solar subsidies from MNRE. Yep, the Ministry of New and Renewable Energy is pushing hard for a greener India, and your roof is the perfect place to start.
normalised: guess what, chennai folks? going solar is now even easier and cheaper! thanks to the updated rooftop solar subsidies from M N R E. yep, the ministry of new and renewable energy is pushing hard for a greener india, and your roof is the perfect place to start.

unnormalised: Word on the street is, you can get some serious discounts installing solar panels. We're talking significant Rs. savings on those electricity bills, maybe enough to cover your Onam Sadhya expenses for the whole family!
normalised: word on the street is, you can get some serious discounts installing solar panels. we are talking significant rupee savings on those electricity bills, maybe enough to cover your onam sadhya expenses for the whole family!

unnormalised: Tamil Nadu Electricity Board (TNEB) is streamlining the application process, making it less of a headache. Think of it like this: less paperwork, more biryani.
normalised: tamil nadu electricity board (T N E B) is streamlining the application process, making it less of a headache. think of it like this: less paperwork, more biryani.

unnormalised: The subsidy amount varies depending on the size of your system (e.g., a 3kW system gets a sweet deal), but it's worth checking out. Imagine generating your own power and being less reliant on the grid! Plus, you're doing your bit for the planet.
normalised: the subsidy amount varies depending on the size of your system (e.g., a three kilowatt system gets a sweet deal), but it is worth checking out. imagine generating your own power and being less reliant on the grid! plus, you are doing your bit for the planet.

unnormalised: Even small businesses in Madurai are jumping on the bandwagon. So ditch the excuses and soak up the sun, responsibly of course! Contact your local installer for a free quote today and let the savings shine!
normalised: even small businesses in madurai are jumping on the bandwagon. so ditch the excuses and soak up the sun, responsibly of course! contact your local installer for a free quote today and let the savings shine!
